title: varuvAy varuvAy
sahitya:
varuvAi varuvAi varuvAi kaNNA varuvAi varuvAi varuvAi kaNNA
caraNam 1 uruvAi arivil vaLarvAi kaNNA uyirin amudAi pozhivAi kaNNA
karuvAi ennuL vaLarvAi kaNNA kamalat-tiruvODiNaivAi kaNNA

   caraNam 2  iNaivAi enadAviyilE kaNNA idayattinilE amarvAi kaNNA
kaNaiyA asurar talaigaL shidarak-kaNaiyUzhiyilE paDaiyODezhuvAi

   caraNam 3  ezhuvAi kaDal mIdinilE ezhuvAi iravik-kiNaiyAi uLamIdinilE
tozhuvEn shivanAm ninaiyE kaNNA tuNaiyE amarar tozhum vAnavanE
